now what is miso you might be like hey I
never really understood what it is to

usually it's rice but it could also be
barley and sometimes soybean is the
starter it's been mixed with a fermented
starter and then that's allowed to

then you take that you add soy beans to

at that stage anything fermented under

Shiro miso which is lighter in color and

nuttier flavor
